amendment.description: Add at the end the following: SEC. 2. PROHIBITION ON THE USE OF FEDERAL FUNDS FOR PRESIDENTIAL CAMPAIGN AND LOBBYING ACTIVITIES. With respect to Federal funds received by an entity, other than a natural person, it shall be unlawful for such entity to -- ***.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Tsongas amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Tsongas.
